item.title: CEVO Client Information Disclosure
item.description: tl;dr CEVO was a global eSports company built around North Americaâ€™s largest competitive online PC gaming league. The CEVO client is software that is mandatory to be run during online play. The client was transmitting user authentication details (usernames and passwords) and private conversations in clear text which made them susceptible to eavesdropping attacks. Good day CS:GO friends! Reference: /r/globaloffensive post about ESEA’s password security from early spring 2015.
